attributes.action: Essex cancer scanner still standing idle as hospital decision drags on & on
attributes.additional_details:
Please refer to the related media coverage

http://www.echo-news.co.uk/news/14306013.Cancer_scanner_still_standing_idle_as_hospital_decision_drags_on/

http://www.echo-news.co.uk/news/14222361.Dispute_over_new_cancer_scanner_at_Southend_Hospital_drags_on/
attributes.background: NHS England wants to install a new state-of-the-art scanner in south Essex, Basildon and Southend hospitals have spent the last year arguing it should be installed at their sites. The aim of this petition is to deliver a decision to ensure all the people of Essex have access to this scanner ASAP !

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take action. This decision seems to be the responsibility of the local hospitals involved.
